name: Scary nun horror escape
description:
Experience the most creepy escape story ever. You would love this mystery game as there are real
haunted scenes in the escape house church and you will hear the realistic sound of the screaming all
around you. This angry scary asylum game is all about the suspense and the secret mission that you will
going to find out. Play the thrilling missions in this nun survival escape house simulator. Start the horror
nun game now and find out the secret story behind the horror castle and the church.
Let’s involve in the story of the horror nun escape:
Are you afraid of the horror story? Do you want to hear the story of the escape plan from the scream
house? You want to listen about the incident of the scary nun? Do you know that she lives in a haunted
mansion where no one is dared to live? She is the only horror nun there in that abandoned house. But
there is an escape story behind this. Once it was a castle of happy family. Everything seemed so
contented in their lives. They lived there happily but soon some mystery happened in that castle and

everything was out of the control. The family members began to escape from the castle and one day the
house was abandoned with this scary horror story. No one know what happened to the family.
Are you courageous enough to solve the secret mission of this horror haunted mansion besides the
church where no one is dared to go? Let’s find out how you can make the scary escape plan for this
mystery game. You need to be careful about the horror nun house as she needs to be out of that
abandoned house when you are going in there otherwise you will lost there. This scary asylum must be
your survival mission in this nun escape house.
Now it’s getting outside and you saw no one is there in that scary haunted mansion. So this is the best
time to enter into the house because scary nun is out from the scream house. Now you are in the scary
asylum. Roam around the rooms of the castle. You might find something about the mystery. You are
entering into the room where scary nun sleeps. Did you hear some kind of scream? Oh! Did you hear
someone locked the door? Go there and check if the door is locked or not! Alas! There you are! You are
now trapped in the scary asylum escape house church. There is nothing you can do now. You can’t
escape from this horror church.
Now don’t be afraid or scared. You need to make a nun survival escape plan right now!! Don’t think of
being trapped here for lifetime. Make a plan in this scary nun house before nun comes back. You need
to find out the keys of the locked door in this horror nun house church. You don’t have enough time for
this as you have only 5 days for the survival mission otherwise the scary nun will come back to the
haunted mansion and will injured you with her axe and sword. If you don’t want to survive in this horror
escape house then you need to find out keys and also the axe for the combat attack.

HOW TO PLAY THIS GAME
Tap to start the scary nun house escape mission
You are now in the scary nun house church
Search for the keys to unlock the door of the haunted mansion
Easy to use on screen controls to roam around the nun house

FEATURES
3D extreme haunted escape nun house environment
Horror creepy background sounds
5 days to accomplish the horror escape plan
Trapped in the horror nun house
Search for the keys in the abandoned house within 5 days
